title: So I tried the new rengar first time since rework
body:
He's trash.

Riot successfully removed another champion from game.

Actually, he's worse than trash.

replies.body:
Just looked you up. You haven't even played rengar in your last 20 games.

GTFO

> [{quoted}](name=royal Joker 1,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=KOJ7dpjh,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-02-23T22:17:35.541+0000)
>
> I'm trash.
> 
> Riot successfully made another champion OP.
> 
> Actually, I'm worse than trash.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wc07UQuk7nY

Champ isn't trash (actually broken) but you're right they completely removed him from the game. They killed Rengar's assassin identity, which also killed the population of Rengar mains. Most of us cannot find enjoyment in our main and that's a pretty messed up situation that Riot will not address for whatever reason. Waiting on him to be reverted or at least 80% reverted.
he's feast or famine, get ahead and delete or fall behind and become irrelevant, maybe it's my bronze but that's what happens to me
Why are the forums so damn interesting today?

Actually, you just dont have any idea how to use his new kit.

Everyone else is mad about how overpowered he has been recently.

Press Q after you finished the jump, it's not an AA mod anymore.

Also, people can see Rengar during his ulti, if they are within the jump range (akin to how Eve's perma stealth works now). So beware of that.
